data.title: Useful Links – Horam
data.text:
Learnyay helps adults find free education courses and training. By connecting them with ESFA and local authority funded colleges, schools and training providers in their area.

With many people furloughed and self-isolating, we feel it’s more important than ever to raise awareness about free education courses and training. More details can be found using the following link: https://www.learnyay.co.uk

Home learning will help people make the most of their time and cope better with self-isolation. It will also improve their employment prospects at a time when many jobs are a risk.

WikiJob is the best place to prepare for your interview, assessment centre or aptitude test. People can read expert advice and speak to other candidates. More details can be found on the following link: https://www.wikijob.co.uk/

https://press.gocompare.com/news/bad-weather-warning-how-to-protect-homes-cars-and-pets

VIRGIN MEDIA – HOW TO CHECK BROADBAND SPEED

Virgin Media has put together a step-by-step guide to broadband speeds to get you back up to speed as quickly as possible if slow WiFi is getting you down.

They will explain to people how to test their download and upload speeds and what their speed test results mean. Please use the following link:
